name: Recipe - Food - Nutrition
description:
The spoonacular Nutrition, Recipe, and Food API allows you to access over 365,000 recipes and 86,000 food products. Our food ontology and semantic recipe search engine makes it possible to search for recipes using natural language queries, such as "gluten free brownies without sugar" or "low fat vegan cupcakes." You can automatically calculate the nutritional information for any recipe, analyze recipe costs, visualize ingredient lists, find recipes for what's in your fridge, find recipes based on special diets, nutritional requirements, or favorite ingredients, classify recipes into types and cuisines, convert ingredient amounts, or even compute an entire meal plan. With our powerful API, you can create many kinds of food and especially nutrition apps.

Special diets/dietary requirements currently available include: vegan, vegetarian, pescetarian, gluten free, grain free, dairy free, high protein, low sodium, low carb, Paleo, Primal, ketogenic, FODMAP, and Whole 30. We will soon be adding Weight Watcher points, too.

api_methods.name: Create Recipe Card (Deprecated)
api_methods.description: Create a recipe card given a recipe.

parameters.name: backgroundImage
parameters.description: The background image ("none","background1", or "background2").

parameters.name: readyInMinutes
parameters.description: The number of minutes it takes to get the recipe on the table.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the recipe.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: The binary image of the recipe as jpg.

parameters.name: mask
parameters.description: The mask to put over the recipe image ("ellipseMask", "diamondMask", "diamondMask", "starMask", "heartMask", "potMask", "fishMask").

parameters.name: instructions
parameters.description: The instructions to make the recipe. One step per line.

parameters.name: ingredients
parameters.description: The ingredient list of the recipe, one ingredient per line.

parameters.name: servings
parameters.description: The number of servings that you can make from the ingredients.

parameters.name: fontColor
parameters.description: The font color on the recipe card as a hex-string.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source of the recipe.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: The author of the recipe.

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: The background color on the recipe card as a hex-string.

utterances.utterance: Can you create a recipe card for 'Vegan Chocolate Cake' with a star mask and a background image of 'background2'? It should be ready in 45 minutes and serve 8 people. The ingredients are 2 cups of flour, 1 cup of cocoa powder, and 1 cup of sugar. The instructions are: Mix all ingredients, bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.

parameters.title: Vegan Chocolate Cake
parameters.instructions:
Mix all ingredients
Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes
parameters.ingredients:
2 cups of flour
1 cup of cocoa powder
1 cup of sugar

utterances.utterance: I need a recipe card for 'Spaghetti Bolognese' with a heart mask and no background image. It should be ready in 30 minutes and serve 4. Ingredients include 200g spaghetti, 100g minced beef, and 1 cup tomato sauce. Instructions: Cook spaghetti, fry beef, add sauce.

parameters.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
parameters.instructions:
Cook spaghetti
Fry beef
Add sauce
parameters.ingredients:
200g spaghetti
100g minced beef
1 cup tomato sauce

utterances.utterance: Create a recipe card for 'Chicken Curry' with a diamond mask and background1. It should be ready in 60 minutes and serve 6. Ingredients: 500g chicken, 2 cups coconut milk, 1 tbsp curry powder. Instructions: Cook chicken, add coconut milk, stir in curry powder.

parameters.title: Chicken Curry
parameters.instructions:
Cook chicken
Add coconut milk
Stir in curry powder
parameters.ingredients:
500g chicken
2 cups coconut milk
1 tbsp curry powder

utterances.utterance: I'd like a recipe card for 'Quinoa Salad' with a fish mask and background2. It should be ready in 20 minutes and serve 3. Ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 1 cucumber, 1 tomato. Instructions: Cook quinoa, chop vegetables, mix together.

parameters.title: Quinoa Salad
parameters.instructions:
Cook quinoa
Chop vegetables
Mix together

utterances.utterance: Make a recipe card for 'Pancakes' with an ellipse mask and no background image. It should be ready in 15 minutes and serve 2. Ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1 egg, 1 cup milk. Instructions: Mix ingredients, cook on skillet.

parameters.title: Pancakes
parameters.instructions:
Mix ingredients
Cook on skillet

utterances.utterance: Could you create a recipe card for 'Beef Stew' with a pot mask and background1? It should be ready in 120 minutes and serve 5. Ingredients: 500g beef, 2 potatoes, 1 carrot. Instructions: Brown beef, add vegetables, simmer.

parameters.title: Beef Stew
parameters.instructions:
Brown beef
Add vegetables
Simmer

utterances.utterance: I want a recipe card for 'Caesar Salad' with a star mask and background2. It should be ready in 10 minutes and serve 2. Ingredients: 1 romaine lettuce, 1/2 cup croutons, 1/4 cup parmesan. Instructions: Chop lettuce, add croutons, sprinkle parmesan.

parameters.title: Caesar Salad
parameters.instructions:
Chop lettuce
Add croutons
Sprinkle parmesan

1/2 cup croutons

utterances.utterance: Please create a recipe card for 'Lemon Tart' with a heart mask and background1. It should be ready in 90 minutes and serve 8. Ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1/2 cup sugar, 2 lemons. Instructions: Mix ingredients, bake at 350°F for 45 minutes.

parameters.instructions:

Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes

utterances.utterance: Generate a recipe card for 'Mushroom Risotto' with a diamond mask and no background image. It should be ready in 40 minutes and serve 4. Ingredients: 1 cup arborio rice, 200g mushrooms, 1/2 cup parmesan. Instructions: Cook rice, sauté mushrooms, stir in parmesan.

parameters.title: Tomato Soup
parameters.instructions:

api_methods.name: Recipe Nutrition Widget
api_methods.description:
Visualize a recipe's nutritional information as HTML including CSS. 

Full example code of how to work with widgets can be found in our [spoonacular-widget GitHub](https://github.com/ddsky/spoonacular-widgets).

parameters.name: servings
parameters.description: The number of servings.

parameters.name: ingredientList
parameters.description: The ingredient list of the recipe, one ingredient per line.

parameters.name: showBacklink
parameters.description: Whether to show a backlink to spoonacular.

parameters.name: defaultCss
parameters.description: Whether the default CSS should be added to the response.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The input language, either "en" or "de".

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the nutritional information for a recipe with 4 servings of 2 cups of spinach and 1 cup of almonds?
I need the nutrition details for a dish with 3 servings of 200g chicken breast and 100g broccoli, and please include the default CSS.
What's the nutritional breakdown for a meal with 5 servings of 1 liter of milk and 50g of oats, and make sure to show the backlink.
Give me the nutrition facts for a recipe with 2 servings of 3 oz of flour and 2 eggs, in German.
I'd like to see the nutritional info for a dish with 6 servings of 500g of beef and 200g of carrots, without the default CSS.
Can you provide the nutrition details for a recipe with 3 servings of 1 cup of quinoa and 1 avocado, and don't show the backlink?
Show me the nutritional information for a meal with 4 servings of 2 bananas and 1 cup of yogurt, in English.
I need the nutrition facts for a dish with 7 servings of 300g of salmon and 100g of spinach, and include the default CSS.
What's the nutritional breakdown for a recipe with 2 servings of 1 cup of rice and 1 chicken breast, and make sure to show the backlink.
Give me the nutrition details for a meal with 5 servings of 2 cups of pasta and 100g of cheese, in German.

api_methods.name: Detect Food in Text
api_methods.description: Detect ingredients and dishes in texts.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text in which food items such as dish names and ingredients should be detected in.
parameters.default: I like to eat delicious tacos. Only cheeseburger with cheddar are better than that. But then again, pizza with pepperoni, mushrooms, and tomatoes is so good!

utterances.utterance: Can you find the food items mentioned in this text: 'I had a delightful breakfast with pancakes, maple syrup, and fresh strawberries.'?

parameters.text: I had a delightful breakfast with pancakes, maple syrup, and fresh strawberries.

utterances.utterance: Identify the dishes in this sentence: 'For dinner, I prepared a spicy chicken curry with basmati rice and naan bread.'

parameters.text: For dinner, I prepared a spicy chicken curry with basmati rice and naan bread.

utterances.utterance: What food items can you detect in this text: 'My favorite snacks are chocolate chip cookies and salted caramel ice cream.'?

parameters.text: My favorite snacks are chocolate chip cookies and salted caramel ice cream.

utterances.utterance: Please list the ingredients in this description: 'The salad was made with fresh lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and a drizzle of olive oil.'

parameters.text: The salad was made with fresh lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and a drizzle of olive oil.

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me the food items in this text: 'I love having a cup of coffee with a slice of banana bread in the morning.'?

parameters.text: I love having a cup of coffee with a slice of banana bread in the morning.

utterances.utterance: Detect the dishes mentioned here: 'We enjoyed a hearty lunch of beef stew with potatoes and carrots.'

parameters.text: We enjoyed a hearty lunch of beef stew with potatoes and carrots.

utterances.utterance: What ingredients are in this text: 'The smoothie was a blend of bananas, spinach, almond milk, and chia seeds.'?

parameters.text: The smoothie was a blend of bananas, spinach, almond milk, and chia seeds.

utterances.utterance: Identify the food items in this sentence: 'For dessert, we had a rich chocolate cake with vanilla ice cream.'

parameters.text: For dessert, we had a rich chocolate cake with vanilla ice cream.

utterances.utterance: Can you find the ingredients in this text: 'The pasta was tossed with garlic, olive oil, and parmesan cheese.'?

parameters.text: The pasta was tossed with garlic, olive oil, and parmesan cheese.

utterances.utterance: List the food items mentioned in this description: 'I made a sandwich with turkey, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.'

parameters.text: I made a sandwich with turkey, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.

api_methods.name: Image Analysis (File)
api_methods.description: Classify and analyze a food image.

utterances.utterance: Can you analyze this picture of my lunch?
What can you tell me about the food in this image?
Please classify the meal shown in this photo.
I'd like to know the nutritional content of the dish in this picture.
Could you provide an analysis of the food in this image?
What type of cuisine is in this photo?
Analyze this image and tell me about the ingredients.
Can you classify the food in this picture?
What does this image say about the meal's nutritional value?
Please analyze this food photo for me.

api_methods.name: Compute Shopping List
api_methods.description: Compute a shopping list from a set of simple foods. This endpoint does not require usernames.

api_methods.name: Generate Shopping List
api_methods.description: Generate the shopping list for a user from the meal planner in a given time frame.

parameters.name: end-date
parameters.description: The end date in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The private hash for the username.

parameters.name: start-date
parameters.description: The start date in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

constraints.inter-dependency: start-date, end-date: start-date must be before or equal to end-date.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username.

utterances.utterance: Can you create a shopping list for me from June 1st to June 7th?
I need a shopping list for my meal plan starting from May 15th to May 20th.
Generate a shopping list for the week of July 1st to July 7th.

I want a shopping list for the period between September 5th and September 12th.
Could you prepare a shopping list for my meal plan from October 1st to October 7th?
Get me a shopping list for the days from November 3rd to November 9th.
I'd like a shopping list for my meals from December 1st to December 5th.
Can you generate a shopping list for the time frame of January 10th to January 15th?
Please create a shopping list for my meal plan from February 20th to February 25th.

api_methods.name: Classify Grocery Product Bulk
api_methods.description: Provide a set of product jsons, get back classified products.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The display name of the returned category, supported is en_US (for American English) and en_GB (for British English).

api_methods.name: Compute Glycemic Load
api_methods.description: Retrieve the glycemic index for a list of ingredients and compute the individual and total glycemic load.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The input language, either \\\"en\\\" or \\\"de\\\".

utterances.utterance: Can you calculate the glycemic load for these ingredients: rice, chicken, and broccoli?
I need the glycemic index for apples and bananas. Please compute the glycemic load.
What's the glycemic load for a meal with quinoa, spinach, and almonds?
Calculate the glycemic load for pasta and tomato sauce in German.
Could you find out the glycemic load for oatmeal and honey?
Please compute the glycemic load for a dish containing lentils, carrots, and peas.
I want to know the glycemic load for a breakfast with eggs, toast, and avocado.
Can you tell me the glycemic load for a salad with lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers in English?
What's the glycemic load for a smoothie with bananas, strawberries, and yogurt?
Compute the glycemic load for a dinner with salmon, quinoa, and asparagus in German.

api_methods.name: Parse Ingredients
api_methods.description: Extract an ingredient from plain text.

parameters.name: ingredientList
parameters.description: The ingredient list of the recipe, one ingredient per line.

parameters.name: servings
parameters.description: The number of servings that you can make from the ingredients.

parameters.name: includeNutrition
parameters.description: Whether nutrition data should be added to correctly parsed ingredients.

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me how many servings I can make with 2 cups of flour, 1 cup of sugar, and 3 eggs?

parameters.ingredientList:
2 cups of flour
1 cup of sugar
3 eggs

utterances.utterance: I have 200g of chicken breast and 100g of broccoli. How many servings can I prepare?
Please extract the ingredients from 1 cup of quinoa, 2 cups of water, and 1 tsp of salt for 4 servings.

parameters.ingredientList:
1 cup of quinoa
2 cups of water
1 tsp of salt

utterances.utterance: How many servings can I make with 500g of pasta and 200g of tomato sauce? Include nutrition information.
I need to know the servings for 1 liter of milk, 100g of oats, and 50g of almonds.

parameters.ingredientList:
1 liter of milk
100g of oats
50g of almonds

utterances.utterance: Can you parse the ingredients for 3 oz pork shoulder and 2 tbsp of olive oil for 3 servings?

parameters.ingredientList:
3 oz pork shoulder
2 tbsp of olive oil

utterances.utterance: What are the ingredients for 2 cups of rice and 1 cup of peas for 5 servings? Include nutrition details.

parameters.ingredientList:
2 cups of rice
1 cup of peas

utterances.utterance: How many servings can I get from 250g of salmon and 100g of spinach?
Please provide the servings for 1 kg of potatoes and 200g of cheese.
Can you calculate the servings for 3 bananas and 1 cup of yogurt? I need the nutrition info too.

api_methods.name: Analyze Recipe
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to send raw recipe information, such as title, servings, and ingredients, to then see what we compute (badges, diets, nutrition, and more). This is useful if you have your own recipe data and want to enrich it with our semantic analysis.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The input language, either \\\"en\\\" or \\\"de\\\".

utterances.utterance: Can you analyze this recipe for chocolate chip cookies and include the taste profile?
I have a recipe for vegan lasagna. Could you provide the nutritional information in German?
Please analyze my homemade pizza recipe and include both taste and nutrition details.
Can you give me a detailed analysis of my apple pie recipe?
I'd like to know the nutritional content of my quinoa salad recipe.
Could you analyze the taste of my spicy tofu stir-fry recipe?
Analyze my recipe for beef stew and provide the results in German.
Can you check the nutrition facts for my gluten-free bread recipe?
I need a taste analysis for my lemon tart recipe.
Please analyze my recipe for chicken curry and include both taste and nutrition information in German.

api_methods.name: Analyze Recipe Instructions
api_methods.description: Extract ingredients and equipment from the recipe instruction steps.

parameters.name: instructions
parameters.description: The instructions text.
parameters.default: Put the garlic in a pan and then add the onion.

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me the ingredients and equipment needed for this recipe: 'Chop the tomatoes and add them to the salad bowl. Mix with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.'?

parameters.instructions: Chop the tomatoes and add them to the salad bowl. Mix with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

utterances.utterance: What do I need to make this dish: 'Boil the pasta until al dente, then drain and toss with pesto sauce.'?

parameters.instructions: Boil the pasta until al dente, then drain and toss with pesto sauce.

utterances.utterance: List the ingredients and tools for this recipe: 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix flour and sugar in a bowl, then add eggs and milk.'

parameters.instructions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix flour and sugar in a bowl, then add eggs and milk.

utterances.utterance: Could you extract the ingredients and equipment from these steps: 'Grill the chicken breast until cooked through. Serve with a side of steamed broccoli.'?

parameters.instructions: Grill the chicken breast until cooked through. Serve with a side of steamed broccoli.

utterances.utterance: What are the necessary items for this recipe: 'Sauté the mushrooms in butter, then add garlic and thyme. Pour in the cream and simmer.'?

parameters.instructions: Sauté the mushrooms in butter, then add garlic and thyme. Pour in the cream and simmer.

utterances.utterance: Identify the ingredients and equipment for this cooking process: 'Whisk the eggs in a bowl, then pour into a hot skillet. Cook until the edges are set.'

parameters.instructions: Whisk the eggs in a bowl, then pour into a hot skillet. Cook until the edges are set.

utterances.utterance: Can you find out what I need for this recipe: 'Blend the bananas with yogurt and honey until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve chilled.'?

parameters.instructions: Blend the bananas with yogurt and honey until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve chilled.

utterances.utterance: Extract the necessary items from these instructions: 'Marinate the beef in soy sauce and ginger. Grill on high heat for 5 minutes each side.'

parameters.instructions: Marinate the beef in soy sauce and ginger. Grill on high heat for 5 minutes each side.

utterances.utterance: What ingredients and tools are required for this: 'Mix the dry ingredients in a bowl. Slowly add water while stirring to form a dough.'?

parameters.instructions: Mix the dry ingredients in a bowl. Slowly add water while stirring to form a dough.

utterances.utterance: Can you list the items needed for this recipe: 'Fry the bacon until crispy. Remove and set aside. In the same pan, scramble the eggs.'?

parameters.instructions: Fry the bacon until crispy. Remove and set aside. In the same pan, scramble the eggs.

api_methods.name: Connect User
api_methods.description:
In order to call user-specific endpoints, you need to connect your app's users to spoonacular users.

Just call this endpoint with your user's information and you will get back a username and hash that you must save on your side. In future requests that you make on this user's behalf you simply pass their username and hash alongside your API key.

api_methods.name: Map Ingredients to Grocery Products
api_methods.description: Map a set of ingredients to products you can buy in the grocery store.

api_methods.name: Classify a Grocery Product
api_methods.description: Given a grocery product title, this endpoint allows you to detect what basic ingredient it is.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale of the returned category, supported is en\_US and en\_GB.

parameters.name: ingredientList
parameters.description: The ingredient list of the recipe, one ingredient per line.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the recipe.
